archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SYS.4.BP7 Establish bidirectional traceability
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish bidirectional traceability between elements of the system architectural design and test cases included in the system integration test specification. Establish bidirectional traceability between test cases included in the system integration test specification and system integration test results. NOTE 7: Bidirectional traceability supports coverage, consistency and impact analysis.
